titleStmt.title: The votes of the House, or The dayly proceedings in Parliament since the coming in of the secluded members the 21 of February 1659, untill the dissolution of the Parliament March 16 1659. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Oliver, fl. 1657-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Iohn Redmayne in Lovels Court in Pater-noster-row,

notesStmt.note: Originally published daily as a serial when Parliament was sitting; usual title was "A perfect diurnal of every dayes proceedings in Parliament"; at the end of the session was re-issued with general title page.
Edited by Oliver Williams. Cf. Nelson and Seccombe, 501.
Thomason Tract copy includes a counterfeit no. 3 printed by D. Maxwell.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
